repo_description: One api to query them all

schemas.name: openweather.type.graphql
tvdb.type.graphql
schemas.content:
type Query {
  series(name: String!, limit: Int): [Series]
}


type Series {
  airedAt: String
  airsDayOfWeek: String
  airsTime: String
  aliases: [String]
  banner: String
  episodes: [Episode]
  genre: [String]
  id: String
  imdbId: String
  name: String
  network: String
  overview: String
  rating: String
  seasons(seasonNumber: Int): [Season]
  status: String
}

type Season {
  episodes: [Episode]
  number: Int
}

type Episode {
  absoluteNumber: Int
  airedAt: String
  artwork: String
  directors: [String]
  guestStars: [String]
  imdbId: String
  name: String
  overview: String
  relativeNumber: Int
  season: Int
  writers: [String]
}

schemas.name: common.graphql
omdb.type.graphql
schemas.content:
type Query {
  movies(title: String!, limit: Int, skip: Int): [Movie]
  movie(imdbId: String!): Movie
}

type MovieImdb {
  id: String
  rating: String
  votes: String
}

type MovieRottenTomatoes {
  rating: String
}

type MovieMetacritic {
  rating: String
}

type Movie {
  title: String
  year: String
  rated: String
  released: String
  runtime: String
  genre: [String]
  director: String
  writer: String
  actors: [String]
  plot: String
  language: [String]
  country: [String]
  awards: String
  poster: String
  boxOffice: String
  production: String
  website: String
  imdb: MovieImdb
  metacritic: MovieMetacritic
  rottenTomatoes: MovieRottenTomatoes
}
